entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
